Content.Text:
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! Have you come to see me? I'm
glad!
<PAGE>
I've got something I need to do, though,
so can you just wait a moment?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm just getting Felicity to write an
article.
<PAGE>
One of the journalists I work with has
asked her to write something for the
paper.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't know about that yet, do you?
<PAGE>
You might not think so just by looking 
at her, but Felicity's something of a 
famous food critic. 
<PAGE>
Not only does she really know her stuff,
but she has a way with food related
words. Food lovers love her!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to keep you waiting, Tina! Here's
the finished text.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks Felicity! You've really saved my
bacon on this one. I'll be sure to send
some cookies your way!
<PAGE>
My work here is done. See you later,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
All that writing about food has made me
want to eat some!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. you're going to treat me?
Wow, thanks so much!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Although, if possible... I'd like to eat
something cooked by you, <MYNAME>. Will
you cook for me?

You've just found out that Felicity also
works as a food critic. What will you
do?
Make something
Maybe not today

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Then let's get going to your
house, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, what a delicious looking Egg Soup!
Let's see how it tastes!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
This soup is.... wonderful! You know
your way around a kitchen, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
What's that? You're happy to have
pleased a food critic? <MYNAME>, how do
you know about that?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I see... Tina told you.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
When people find out that I'm a food
critic they tend to stop cooking things
for me.
<PAGE>
They're worried that I'll start to get
all critical on their culinary skills.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So for you to know that and still make
me something... I'm so happy!
<PAGE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. Today will be
a day I remember forever.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for the delicious food,
<MYNAME>. It really was all wonderful!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Don't tell me Tina told you everything?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I guess that makes it hard for you to
cook for me.
<PAGE>
Why don't you treat me to something at
Clement's place, then? How about that?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Let's go!
